document_data.name: Kai Tyran Uviel
document_data.alignment5e: [[Neutral]]{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|28}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Kai Tyran Uviel''' was a bandit in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.History: Kai was a member of the [[Gray Patriots]] bandit group under [[Sahnd Krulek]]. During a meeting with another bandit group, the [[Claws of Tiamat]], he acted as sentry at the meeting of the two leaders of the outlaws. However, an adventuring party hired to clear the [[Iron Route]] of outlaws killed him.{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|21}}
